mapper.insert: INSERT INTO track_review( rating, content, blinded, likes, dislikes, created_at, critic, user_id, track_id) VALUES (#{rating}, #{content}, #{blinded}, #{likes}, #{dislikes}, #{createdAt}, #{critic}, #{userId}, #{trackId})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM track_review WHERE track_id = #{trackId} AND blinded = 0 ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT tr.id, tr.rating, tr.content, tr.blinded, tr.created_at, tr.critic, tr.user_id, tr.track_id, u.id AS reviewer_id, u.nickname AS reviewer_nickname, u.profile_image AS reviewer_profile_image, u.is_pro AS reviewer_is_pro, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review_like WHERE review_id = tr.id AND review_type = 'TRACK') AS likes, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review_report WHERE review_id = tr.id AND review_type = 'TRACK') AS dislikes FROM track_review tr JOIN user u ON u.id = tr.user_id WHERE tr.track_id = #{trackId} AND tr.blinded = 0 ORDER BY tr.critic DESC, likes DESC, tr.created_at ASC

SELECT tr.id, tr.rating, tr.content, tr.blinded, tr.created_at, tr.critic, tr.user_id, tr.track_id, u.id AS reviewer_id, u.nickname AS reviewer_nickname, u.profile_image AS reviewer_profile_image, u.is_pro AS reviewer_is_pro, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review_like WHERE review_id = tr.id AND review_type = 'TRACK') AS likes, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review_report WHERE review_id = tr.id AND review_type = 'TRACK') AS dislikes
FROM track_review tr JOIN user u ON u.id = tr.user_id
WHERE tr.track_id = #{trackId} AND tr.user_id = #{userId}
LIMIT 1

SELECT tr.id, tr.rating, tr.content, tr.blinded, tr.created_at, tr.critic, tr.user_id, tr.track_id, u.id AS reviewer_id, u.nickname AS reviewer_nickname, u.profile_image AS reviewer_profile_image, u.is_pro AS reviewer_is_pro, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review_like WHERE review_id = tr.id AND review_type = 'TRACK') AS likes, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review_report WHERE review_id = tr.id AND review_type = 'TRACK') AS dislikes, t.title FROM review_like rl JOIN track_review tr ON tr.id = rl.review_id JOIN user u ON tr.user_id = u.id JOIN track t ON tr.track_id = t.id WHERE rl.user_id = #{loginUserId} AND rl.review_type = 'TRACK'
AND ( t.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR tr.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR u.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') )
ORDER BY
CASE WHEN t.title LIKE CONCAT(#{keyword}, '%') THEN 0 WHEN t.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') THEN 1 WHEN tr.content LIKE CONCAT(#{keyword}, '%') THEN 2 WHEN tr.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') THEN 3 WHEN u.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') THEN 4 WHEN u.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') THEN 5 ELSE 6 END, rl.created_at DESC
rl.created_at DESC
LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review_like rl WHERE rl.user_id = 1 AND review_type = 'TRACK'
mapper.update: UPDATE track_review SET blinded = #{blinded} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE track_review SET likes = likes + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE track_review SET dislikes = dislikes + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT track_id, ROUND(AVG(rating)) AS avg_score, SUM(CASE WHEN critic = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS critic_count, SUM(CASE WHEN critic = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS user_count FROM track_review WHERE track_id = #{trackId} AND blinded = 0 GROUP BY track_id

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM album_review ar JOIN album_review target ON target.id = #{reviewId} WHERE ar.album_id = target.album_id AND ( ( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review_like WHERE review_id = ar.id AND review_type = 'TRACK') > (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review_like WHERE review_id = target.id AND review_type = 'TRACK') ) OR ( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review_like WHERE review_id = ar.id AND review_type = 'TRACK') = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review_like WHERE review_id = target.id AND review_type = 'TRACK') AND ar.created_at < target.created_at ) )
